title: Elmo birthday biscuits
ingredients: ['For the biscuits', '125g soft butter', '120g sugar', 'Few dops vanilla essence', '1 egg', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'To decorate', 'large marshmallows', 'melted chocolate for the eyes', 'orange jelly beans for the nose', 'icing sugar', 'lemon juice', 'red food coloring', 'melted chocolate for the mouth']
